definition: A game of chance involving the selection of numbers, typically played by purchasing tickets and matching the numbers drawn to win prizes. It is commonly used to refer to a popular form of gambling or a lottery-like game.

examples.english: I play the lottery every week.

examples.german: Gestern habe ich im Lotto gewonnen.
Lottozahlen werden jeden Mittwoch und Samstag gezogen.
examples.english: Lottery numbers are drawn every Wednesday and Saturday.

examples.german: Meine Oma spielt seit Jahren Lotto.
examples.english: My grandma has been playing the lottery for years.

examples.german: Der Jackpot im Lotto ist auf 10 Millionen Euro angestiegen.
examples.english: The jackpot in the lottery has reached 10 million euros.
